sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select>
        <option disabled value="">Выберите из списка</option>
        <option 
        v-for="option in options" 
        :key="option.value"
        :value="option.value">
        {{ option.name }}
    </option>
    </select>

</template>

<script>
import {sortList} from '@/GlobalData/MenuLinks';
export default {
    name: 'my-sort',
    data() {
        return {
            sortMenuList: sortList     
        }
    }

}

</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">

</style>


import {menuList} from '@/GlobalData/MenuLinks';

export default {
    name: "Header",
    data() {
        return {
            headerMenuList: menuList     
        }
